attributes.description: This vehicle is a 2016 BMW X1 sDrive20d, specifically put together for your driving comfort and enjoyment. The BMW has always offered the ultimate in luxury, performance and exterior and interior design are just beautiful. It comes with power steering, electric windows, multi-functioning steering, central locking remote, cream leather seats, performance control, runflat tyres, velour floor mats, child setas ISOFIX attachment, intelligent emergency calling, hot climate countries vesion, automatic lock when driving away, sump guard, preparation for trailer tow hitch, double lock function, day time driving lights selectable by lights menu, shipping protection, larger-capacity fuel tank, model designation, roof rails and sills in Jet Black, luggage compartment net, cruise control with Brake Function, telematics and online service provider control. For this and more exciting specials on offers please feel free to visit a CCS dealership near you or alternatively you can download an application form for finance of the back of our website for your convenience. Your loyalty and support as our current and future client is highly appreciated. Giving you excellent service is always a pleasure. Our price excludes additional costs such as license, registration and COR. The mechanical warranty is optional.
